kw,Kuwait,Health & Fitness,6013,1,1446985492,Salem | سالم,Ministry of Health - infrmation System Department,https://apps.apple.com/kw/app/salem-%D8%B3%D8%A7%D9%84%D9%85/id1446985492?uo=4,0.0,3.59375,32,Health & Fitness,"Salem Application

Salem is the official application of the Ministry of Health in the State of Kuwait. It aims to enable citizens and residents to securely and quickly access their health services and medical records, with the ability to easily manage family members’ health profiles.
1. Health Information Access
Users can view the following:

column3: Prescriptions by date and healthcare facility or hospital

column1: 2. Service Requests and Applications
Users can submit the following requests through the app:

column3: Appointment booking with a visiting doctor
Request for pest and rodent control services

column1: Login Requirement
The app requires login using Kuwait Mobile ID .",2019-03-03T21:55:05Z,2025-11-19T18:08:30Z

kw,Kuwait,Health & Fitness,6013,2,1241749331,Pharmazone Pharmacy,PHARMAZONE GENERAL TRADING COMPANY,https://apps.apple.com/kw/app/pharmazone-pharmacy/id1241749331?uo=4,0.0,4.75441,3457,Health & Fitness,"Pharmazone : Tailoring Health & Beauty to you !

Discover the future of personal health and beauty shopping with Pharmazone, your ultimate guide to navigating the world of pharmaceutical and cosmetic products. At Pharmazone, we're redefining how you shop for skincare, cosmetics, and perfumes by offering a unique, personalized experience tailored to your needs.

Get personalized treatments and product recommendations from a team of reputable pharmacists and dermatology doctors, whether you're looking for specific routines, solutions for particular skin or hair types or want to explore new products. Our advanced filters tell you exactly what your product is free from and its key attributes, ensuring a safer and more informed shopping experience.

Pharmazone is your go-to platform for a free, comprehensive, and user-friendly experience that elevates your health and beauty routine. Say goodbye to the guesswork and hello to smart, personalized, and informed shopping with Pharmazone!

kw,Kuwait,Health & Fitness,6013,3,1037595083,StepsApp Pedometer,StepsApp GmbH,https://apps.apple.com/kw/app/stepsapp-pedometer/id1037595083?uo=4,0.0,4.70265,6457,Health & Fitness,"Join the world’s largest walking community!
StepsApp turns your iPhone into a sleek, powerful step counter — no extra devices needed.
Just slip your phone into your pocket and get moving.
Set goals. Count steps. Burn calories.
STEPSAPP INCLUDES
• Automatic step counting
• Stunning charts and animations
• NEW: Workouts with Map Tracking, Heart Rate Zones and Insights.
• Apple Health integration
• Apple Watch support
• Workouts with GPS tracking
• Active calories
• Insights
• Trends. Totals. Records.
• Powerful day, week, and month views
• Awards with 3D medals
• iOS 14 widgets for your home screen
• Dark and Light Mode
• Six beautiful colors – also change the app icon
• iMessage app
• Today widget
• More Daily goals & Notifications
• Social media sharing
• Wheelchair support
• Export data
• No extra hardware required
YOUR ACTIVITY AT A GLANCE
• Quick overview of your daily steps, distance, time, floors climbed, and active calories.
• Beautiful weekly, monthly, and yearly charts.
• See your progress directly in the today widget.
• Display your current step count or wheelchair pushes on the app icon.
• Notifications when you have reached your daily activity goal.
• Weekly Report
• Set and reach your goal… step by step.
APPLE WATCH & APPLE HEALTH
• Synchronize and import your activity data via Apple Health.
• Track your activity with your iPhone and your Apple Watch.
• StepsApp will merge your steps automatically.
• Now with Apple Watch workouts with GPS tracking.
• Securely store your actively burned calories in Apple Health.
STEPSAPP FOR EVERYONE
• Also enjoy StepsApp with VoiceOver.
• Instead of steps, track wheelchair pushes with your Apple Watch.
• StepsApp supports more than 20 languages.
CUSTOMIZE & SHARE
• Spice up your charts with six beautiful colors.
• Also change the App Icon
• Share your achievements on social media directly from  StepsApp...
• …or with our brand new iMessage app!
Your activity tracker to form a habit of walking, running, hiking
and weight loss.
StepsApp Privacy Policy:
https://steps.app/privacy
* StepsApp requires iPhone 5s or newer",2015-10-10T07:45:24Z,2025-11-20T08:39:12Z

kw,Kuwait,Health & Fitness,6013,4,1325481372,HUAWEI Health,"Huawei Software Technologies Co., Ltd.",https://apps.apple.com/kw/app/huawei-health/id1325481372?uo=4,0.0,4.61149,3480,Health & Fitness,"Your go-to, integrated health and fitness companion. Whether you want to kick-start your fitness life, keep track of your health, or conveniently manage your smart wearable devices, the Huawei Health app has what you're looking for. Keep your data private, or share it with your loved ones, the power's yours. The latest in health and fitness technology, made simple, secure, and easy to use.
Keeps Up with Your Every Move

Keep track of your health journey. Huawei Health records your activity, supporting over 100 different sports, from beginner to advanced levels. See your workout data clearly every step of the way, so you can be sure you're reaching your goals. A wonderful world of fitness at the tip of your fingers.
Run How You Want
A simpler way to run that can benefit anyone. The app is able to record and map out your route as you're running, all while displaying key information so you can stay on target.
An Amazing Journey

Share your health journey with your friends and family. Your outdoor workout routes can be generated into videos with music for you to proudly share. Use Dynamic tracking to create videos to share on social media to inspire yourself and others with your fitness journey.
A New View on Health

See your life in amazing detail with Huawei Health stats. The app keeps records of your heart rate, weight, sleep quality, step count and more. All your data is shown in clear, dynamic graphs so you have a better understanding of your health in a more accessible way.
[health package]
·Synchronize with the weight data in healthkit. When you use the healthy weight data of Huawei mobile phone, this data will be synchronized and recorded in healthkit.

·Synchronize with motion data in healthkit. You can automatically synchronize the exercise data recorded in Huawei health to healthkit. Similarly, Huawei sports health can also obtain the exercise data from healthkit.
Huawei Health app is not intended for medical use, and all data is for reference only.
You should seek a doctor’s advice in addition to using this app and before making any medical decisions.
[Description of auto-renewing subscriptions]
1. Instructions for continuous monthly subscription
--Subscription period: 1 month
- Subscription price: 1 yuan for the first month, 15 yuan per month thereafter
2. Instructions for subscribing and unsubscribing
--Payment: Debit through the user's iTunes account, and the user will pay immediately after confirming the purchase
--Renewal: Apple’s iTunes account will be deducted within 24 hours of expiration. After the deduction is successful, the subscription period will be extended by one subscription period
--Unsubscribe method
Solution 1. Open the Appstore on your phone, click the blue avatar icon in the upper right corner, and then go to ""Subscription""> ""Huawei Sports Health"" to cancel the subscription.

Solution 2: 24 hours before the expiration of the current subscription period, go to the iTunes/Apple ID ""Settings Management"" page and turn off the automatic renewal. Cancellation within 24 hours before expiration will result in a subscription fee.
--Automatic renewal service agreement(EULA): https://consumer.huawei.com/minisite/cloudservice/health/monservice-terms.htm?country=CN&language=zh_Hans_CN

--Membership Agreement (including user privacy agreement): https://consumer.huawei.com/minisite/cloudservice/health/member-terms.htm?country=CN&language=zh_Hans_CN",2018-03-22T06:38:49Z,2025-11-15T10:18:33Z

kw,Kuwait,Health & Fitness,6013,5,6447801011,Numou World,LIGHT FIELDS FOODSTUFF CO,https://apps.apple.com/kw/app/numou-world/id6447801011?uo=4,0.0,4.30769,26,Health & Fitness,"Numou provides balanced nutritional meal plans created with the fresh ingredients made by our specialized Chefs to satisfy your tastebuds and meet quality exceptions.
NUTRITIOUS FOOD DELIVERY
Numou provides nutritious and delicious food, catered to fit your lifestyle. Select your meals from our various programs: Well-Being, Busy B, Keto, Low Carb and Slims.
NOURISH YOURSELF
With our team of dietician and 100+ dishes you never get bored. Numou will ensure you get the right amount of calories to meet your goals; whether to lose, gain or maintain your weight!
DESIGNED TO FIT YOUR NEEDS

Our meals are crafted by our dietician and chefs to meet your daily nutritional value with all organic ingredients. Our meals do not contain artificial ingredients or refined sugars. Our food can meet your needs for various diets including low carb and Keto.
THE CHOICE IS YOURS
With our built-in calendar, customize your plan. Choose your dislikes, inform us about your allergies and keep the rest to our team!
LEARN ABOUT THE WONDERS
Numou strives to educate!
Learn about the food you’re eating with Wonders of the Dish, which will enlighten you with ingredients, origins, and savorys.
CUSTOMER SERVICE
Our customer service team is available to accommodate your needs and assist you with your inquires.
APPLE HEALTH KIT

Infusing the power of Apple HealthKit, we're transforming your running and exercise activities into delectable, diet-friendly meal inspirations within our cutting-edge health & diet food mobile app.",2023-05-03T07:00:00Z,2025-11-13T09:41:29Z

kw,Kuwait,Health & Fitness,6013,6,1038369065,Flo Period & Cycles Tracker,FLO HEALTH UK LIMITED,https://apps.apple.com/kw/app/flo-period-cycles-tracker/id1038369065?uo=4,0.0,4.71225,5543,Health & Fitness,"Live in sync with your cycle using Flo, the world’s most popular female health app. Get personalised insights and predictions on your body.
Whether you want to predict your period, get pregnant, track your pregnancy, or better understand your symptoms, Flo is your all-in-one female health partner. Join over 420 million members.
With Flo, you can:
- Keep your data safe: Flo is the first period and ovulation tracker to achieve dual ISO 27001 and ISO 27701 Certifications (aka gold standards in data protection).
- Feel more understood: Share your Flo insights via Flo for Partners to feel more connected, understood, and supported.
- Get an extra layer of protection: Anonymous Mode means no one, not even Flo, can identify you based on your health data.
- Join a supportive community: Secret Chats is where members can discuss topics and connect with others on the same journey.
- Access reliable health information: Flo collaborates with a globally recognised organisation dedicated to reproductive health and rights, ensuring trustworthy support for your health journey.
With Flo Premium, you can enjoy:
- Monthly cycle reports
- Symptom predictions and patterns
- Tailored prediction insights
- Detailed pregnancy tracking
- Full access to Flo for Partners
- A 24/7 virtual Health Assistant
- All articles, videos, and courses reviewed by 140+ health experts
New! Flo supports perimenopause:
- Know what might be perimenopause and how to tune in to your body’s changes.
- Get clarity on common perimenopause symptoms and what can help.
- Make more informed health decisions and identify what you need to feel your best.
Start tracking your cycle for free today.
Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:
https://flo.health/privacy-policy
https://flo.health/terms-of-use
Connect with Flo:
Web: flo.health
TikTok: @flotracker
Instagram: @flotracker

Please note: Flo is not a diagnostic tool and should not be used as a method of contraception or to facilitate conception. Predictions and insights provided by the app are intended for informational purposes only and are not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult a qualified healthcare provider for any health concerns or decisions.
Flo uses HealthKit to read menstrual cycle data and export your Flo activities to the Health app.
If you have any difficulties using the app, contact Flo via support@flo.health.
Notice of Access Permission:
Flo may request permission for:
- In-app notifications or reminders.
- Uploading photos to specific forum discussions.
- Uploading audio recordings to closed group chats.
Content sharing is entirely optional. Flo does not automatically access your content. You can select what you want to share.",2015-10-03T22:28:36Z,2025-11-19T19:58:17Z

kw,Kuwait,Health & Fitness,6013,7,426826309,"Strava: Run, Bike, Walk",Strava Inc.,https://apps.apple.com/kw/app/strava-run-bike-walk/id426826309?uo=4,0.0,4.80882,68,Health & Fitness,"Strava makes fitness tracking social. We house your entire active journey in one spot – and you get to share it with friends. Here’s how:
• Record everything – runs, rides, hikes, yoga and over 30 other sport types. Think of Strava as the home of your movement.
• Discover anywhere – our Routes tool uses de-identified Strava data to intelligently recommend popular routes based on your preferences. You can also build your own.
• Build a support network – Strava’s about celebrating movement. Here you’ll find your community and cheer each other on.
• Train smarter – get data insights to understand your progress and see how you improve. Your Training Log is the record of all your workouts.
• Get more from your workout – Powered by AI, Athlete Intelligence turns workout data into into instant insights. Keeping you motivated and ready for the next workout – without the guesswork.
• Move safer – share your real-time location with loved ones while outdoors for an extra layer of safety.
• Sync your favourite apps and devices – Strava is compatible with thousands of them (Apple Watch, Fitbit, Garmin – you name it).
• Join and create challenges – join millions in monthly challenges to chase new goals, collect digital badges and stay accountable.
• Embrace the unfiltered – your feed on Strava is filled with real efforts from real people. That’s how we motivate each other.
• Whether you’re a world-class athlete or a total beginner, you belong here. Just record and go.
Strava includes both a free version and a subscription version with premium features.
Strava uses HealthKit to export your Strava activities into the Health app and to read heart rate and biometric data.

You can subscribe and pay on the App Store, using your Apple ID. Payment will be charged to your Apple ID at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription will automatically renew unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renew may be turned off after purchase by going to the ‘Manage Subscription’ page in settings. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. The subscription will renew at the same cost.
Terms of Service: https://www.strava.com/legal/terms
Privacy Policy: https://www.strava.com/legal/privacy",2011-03-24T06:41:32Z,2025-11-19T21:16:00Z

kw,Kuwait,Health & Fitness,6013,10,6744723391,Wellify - Simplify Wellness,Southley Technology Limited,https://apps.apple.com/kw/app/wellify-simplify-wellness/id6744723391?uo=4,0.0,4.58333,24,Health & Fitness,"With Wellify, take control of your health in just a few taps. Effortlessly monitor your heart rate and blood pressure for real-time insights into your well-being. Stay on top of your diet with instant sugar content analysis, helping you make smarter food choices every day. Powered by AI, Wellify simplifies health tracking and delivers personalized advice, so you can focus on living your best life.
→DISCLAIMER: This app promotes fitness and health awareness for a balanced lifestyle, but it is not a replacement for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment.
YOUR PATH TO A HEALTHIER LIFE
◉ Measure——All at Your Fingertips

【Heart Rate Monitor】Stay connected to your heart’s rhythm with real-time monitoring of heart rate and Heart Rate Variability (HRV). Track trends, spot patterns, and discover how your body responds to stress and daily activities.
*** Steps For Accurate Results:
1. Keep your phone steady and ensure you are relaxed.
2. Gently cover the back camera with your fingertip.
3. Remain still and avoid movement until the measurement is complete.
◉ Scan——Nutrition in a Snap
【Calorie Tracker】Effortlessly log your meals with smart food scanning and personalized meal plans. Stay on track with your health goals while enjoying a balanced, stress-free approach to nutrition.

【Smart Sugar Tracker】Take control of your diet with AI-powered sugar insights, helping you make smarter food choices, set personalized goals, and build healthier habits. You can enjoy a balanced lifestyle with confidence.
◉ Engage——Your Wellness Companion

Dive into expert-curated health articles, unwind with guided meditation sessions, and chat with your AI health advisor for personalized, actionable tips. Whether it’s managing stress, building better habits, or staying motivated, this is your ultimate companion for a balanced, healthier lifestyle.
◉ Analyze——Smart Health Insights

Track how dietary sugars relate to your lifestyle patterns. Understand how your activity, sleep, and stress levels may influence your overall wellbeing. This analysis is based on publicly available health data and is intended for general wellness support—not medical advice.
[Sources] (https://www.southleytech.com/source-statement)
UNLIMITED ACCESS TO ALL FEATURES
1. Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account upon purchase confirmation.
2. Manage your subscription and disable auto-renewal in Account Settings.
3. Turn off auto-renewal at least 24 hours before the current period ends to avoid charges.
Terms of Service：https://www.southleytech.com/terms-of-service_wellify
Privacy Policy：https://www.southleytech.com/privacy-policy_wellify",2025-04-21T07:00:00Z,2025-05-18T01:13:03Z

kw,Kuwait,Health & Fitness,6013,12,341232718,MyFitnessPal: Calorie Counter,"MyFitnessPal, Inc.",https://apps.apple.com/kw/app/myfitnesspal-calorie-counter/id341232718?uo=4,0.0,4.75028,2723,Health & Fitness,"Track progress toward your nutrition, water, fitness, and weight loss goals with MyFitnessPal. This all-in-one food tracker and health app is like having a nutrition coach, meal planner, and food diary with you at all times.

MyFitnessPal isn’t another restrictive diet app. This is a health app to help you learn about your habits … see how you eat … make smarter food choices … find motivation & support ... and conquer your health goals.

Download and start your free 30-day Premium trial to access exclusive food tracking, fitness logging tools, and expert guidance. You’ll soon discover why MyFitnessPal is the #1 food and nutrition tracker in the U.S., a GQ 2020 Fitness Awards “Best Fitness App,” and has been featured in the New York Times, Wall Street Journal, the Today Show, and U.S. News & World Report.
SO MUCH MORE THAN A CALORIE TRACKER & FOOD JOURNAL
It’s like having a dietitian, personal trainer, and nutrition coach at your fingertips.
Log Food – Easy-to-use tools make food tracking quick and simple
Record Activity – Add workouts and steps with the fitness tracker
Customize Your Goals – Weight loss, weight gain, weight maintenance, nutrition & fitness
See Your Progress – Track at a glance, or analyze nutrition & calories in detail
Learn From a Registered Dietitian – Meal Plans customized for your target calories, whether you want to lose or gain weight—with access to our Meal Planner tool
Stay Inspired – 500+ healthy goal-focused recipes and 50 workouts keep routines fresh and fun
Connect With Community – Find friends and motivation in our active forums
A CLOSER LOOK AT FEATURES & BENEFITS
Gain Valuable Insights Through Food Logging

Discover which foods fuel you best. It’s not just a diet app, calorie counter to lose weight, or a faster way to fat loss—it’s about holding yourself accountable and understanding what you put in your body.
One of the Largest Food Databases – Track calories in over 14 million foods (including restaurant dishes)
Fast & Easy Food Tracker Tools – Type to search, add foods from your history, or quick-add calories
Bar Code & Meal Scan: Log store-bought foods and entire meals using your phone’s camera
Calorie Tracker – Automatically count calories and see your daily progress
Macro Tracker – See carbs, fat & protein breakdown by gram or percentage—no need for a separate carb tracker or keto diet app!
Nutrition Tracker and Insights – Analyze nutrition intake and set specific goals for macros, cholesterol, sodium, fiber & more
Water Logging – Easily keep track of your water intake.
Customize Your App Experience
Choose settings that help you achieve your goals.
Custom Goals – Track calories by meal or day, set up macro goals & more
Personalized Dashboards – Pick stats you want to see at a glance
Net Carbs Mode/Carb Tracker – To simplify a low carb or keto diet, view net (not total) carbs
Protein Counter – Set your protein goals and track how much you eat during the day
Add Your Own Foods/Meal Tracker – Save recipes and meals for quick logging
Connect 50+ Apps & Devices – From fitness tracker and smartwatch apps, including the Health app
Track With Apple Watch – A calorie tracker, water tracker, and macro tracker on your watch face.
SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS
MyFitnessPal is free to download and use. If you upgrade to MyFitnessPal Premium, we offer monthly & annual auto-renewing subscriptions.

Payment is charged to your credit card through your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription renews automatically unless you turn off auto-renewal in iTunes Account Settings after purchase, or cancel your subscription at least 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period.
View our full terms & conditions and privacy policy: https://www.myfitnesspal.com/privacy-and-terms",2009-12-08T02:04:45Z,2025-11-18T18:49:57Z

kw,Kuwait,Health & Fitness,6013,14,1534140721,خطواتي - خطوات,ADINTOP FZ-LLC,https://apps.apple.com/kw/app/%D8%AE%D8%B7%D9%88%D8%A7%D8%AA%D9%8A-%D8%AE%D8%B7%D9%88%D8%A7%D8%AA/id1534140721?uo=4,0.0,4.43283,134,Health & Fitness,"تطبيق خطواتي - تطبيق لحساب الخطوات والسعرات الحرارية بكل دقة، تعرف على المزيد حول نشاطك اليومي وعدد الخطوات والسعرات الحرارية والمسافات التي تمشيها كل يوم. كما يساعدك تطبيق خطواتي على معرفة كل الأنشطة التي تقوم بها وما هي السعرات الحرارية التي تستهلكها كل يوم. من خلال التطبيق يمكنك التخطيط للوجبات اليومية التي يحتاجها جسمك سواء كانت ترغب في إنقاص أو زيادة أو المحافظة على وزنك. ويحتوي التطبيق أيضًا على قائمة بالوجبات الأكثر شيوعًا مصنفة إلى مجموعات مع معلومات عن كل وجبة من حيث عدد السعرات الحرارية والبروتينات والكربوهيدرات والدهون التي تحتوي عليها. يساعدك التطبيق على معرفة الوزن المثالي والطول والسعرات الحرارية التي يحتاجها جسمك يوميا.
تطبيق حارق لحساب الخطوات والسعرات والتمارين الرياضية والرجيم يوفر لكم الخدمات التالية:
1- حساب السعرات الحرارية بكل دقة.
2- حساب الخطوات اليومية والشهرية.
3- حساب السعرات اللازمة لانقاص الوزن.
3- حساب كتلة الجسم.
4- حساب الوزن المثالي.
5- حساب احتياج الماء اليومي.
6- حساب النوم الصحي.
7- حساب وقت النوم المناسب صحيا.
8- تمارين منزلية لحرق السعرات.
9- تقارير مميزة عن جميع انشطتكم.
10- حساب السعرات الحرارية في الطعام.
11- تطبيق خطواتي متوفر لساعة ابل.
12- ودجت لعرض الخطوات والسعرات
تطبيق حارق - خطوات وسعرات يعتمد على البيانات الواردة من تطبيق صحتي لمتابعة خطواتك والمسافات المقطوعة والطوابق بالإضافة الى البيانات التاريخية.

The Khatwati App - An application that calculates steps and calories with accuracy, learn more about your daily activity, the number of steps, calories and distances you walk each day. The App also helps you to know all the activities you do and what calories you consume every day. Through the application, you can plan the daily meals that your body needs, whether you want to lose, increase or maintain your weight. The app also contains a list of the most popular meals categorized into groups with information on each meal in terms of the number of calories, proteins, carbohydrates and fats it contains. The application helps you to know the ideal weight, height and calories that your body needs daily.
Services provided by the application:
1- Accurately count calories.
2- Calculating daily and monthly steps.
3- Calculate the calories needed to lose weight.
3- Calculation of body mass.
4- Calculating the ideal weight.
5- Calculate the daily water requirement.
6- Calculating healthy sleep.
7- Calculate a healthy sleep time.
8- Home exercises to burn calories.
9- Distinguished reports on all your activities.
The App- Steps and Calories Application integrates with HealthKit APIs to track your steps, distance، flights climbed and to show you more history.",2022-01-10T08:00:00Z,2025-11-17T15:53:24Z

kw,Kuwait,Health & Fitness,6013,15,950624032,حاسبة الحمل,Hayah Site,https://apps.apple.com/kw/app/%D8%AD%D8%A7%D8%B3%D8%A8%D8%A9-%D8%A7%D9%84%D8%AD%D9%85%D9%84/id950624032?uo=4,0.0,4.79427,8414,Health & Fitness,"تطبيق الحمل رقم #1 بشهادة المختصين و المستخدمات
تنصح به الطبيبات و المتخصصات في مجال النساء والولادة
يعطيك تواريخ الولادة بشكل دقيق جداً
يقدم معلومات و حقائق عن الحمل بأسلوب سهل و مبسط مع الميزات التالية:
- تحديد موعد الحمل النهائي مرورا بمراحل الحمل.
- تحديد بداية و نهاية الحمل مع اظهار الفترة الحالية بالايام و الاسابيع و الاشهر.
- تزويد المستخدم بحقائق و معلومات عامة عن الحمل.
- خاصية اضافة التنبيهات المجدولة بحيث تساعد الحامل بتذكير مواعيدها الهامة كموعد زيارة الطبيب أو تناول الدواء أو أوقات الراحة.
- في كل اسبوع من فترة الحمل تستطيع الحامل مشاهدة كل مايتعلق بمعلومات سواء عن الجنين او عن الحامل.
- يدعم التقويم الهجري و الميلادي
- يحوي مجتمع تفاعلي للحوامل تطرحين من خلاله تسؤلاتك واستفسارتك وتشاريكن التجارب والخبرات مع الحوامل من كل البلدان
- استضافة طبيبات استشاريات في تخصص النساء و الولاده والجراحات النسائية التجميليه والعلاجيه

kw,Kuwait,Health & Fitness,6013,16,6753129500,MUSL,Esam Safouq,https://apps.apple.com/kw/app/musl/id6753129500?uo=4,0.0,4.2,5,Health & Fitness,"تطبيق MUSL هو رفيقك المثالي لتحقيق أهدافك الصحية والرياضية.
نوفر لك كل ما تحتاجه لتبني نمط حياة صحي ولياقة بدنية أفضل بسهولة من مكان واحد:
خطط تدريبية ذكية: برامج متنوعة (30 يوم – 90 يوم) تناسب جميع المستويات.
متابعة التغذية والصحة: سجل وجباتك واحسب السعرات الحرارية بدقة.
تتبع تقدمك: راقب التمارين المكتملة، الإنجازات، والسلاسل المستمرة.
إشعارات وتنبيهات: تذكيرات للتمارين والعروض الخاصة.
تم تصميم MUSL بواجهة سهلة الاستخدام وألوان محفزة تساعدك على التركيز والاستمتاع برحلتك.
مع MUSL، صحتك ولياقتك تبدأ بخطوة واحدة.",2025-10-12T07:00:00Z,2025-11-23T22:11:47Z

kw,Kuwait,Health & Fitness,6013,17,6751931427,VitalTide,Bouncing Bubble Network Technology Limited,https://apps.apple.com/kw/app/vitaltide/id6751931427?uo=4,0.0,0,0,Health & Fitness,"【VitalTide APP: Your Portable Health Data Manager, Making Health Management Easier】

In the fast-paced modern life, health management is often ""squeezed out"" by busyness—you can’t find paper and pen when you want to record your blood pressure, lack systematic data when you want to analyze blood glucose changes, and have no way to integrate multiple health indicators. To help you break through these troubles, VitalTide APP comes into being. It integrates the recording of multi-dimensional health indicators such as blood pressure, blood glucose and heart rate, and serves as your reliable health partner that you can rely on at any time with simple operations and clear data presentation.
Core Features: Comprehensive Coverage to Make Health Data ""Traceable""
1. Accurate Recording: Every Measurement Has a Clear Record
● Blood Pressure Recording: Adapted to Daily Monitoring Scenarios

Whether it is the basic blood pressure measurement after getting up in the morning, or irregular monitoring during work breaks, after exercise, etc., the APP has a convenient recording entrance. You can quickly save the data by manually entering the measured values, no complicated operations are required, and it is easy to track the fluctuation trend of blood pressure.
● Blood Glucose Recording: Distinguish Scenarios to Facilitate Diet Analysis

For blood glucose management needs, an intuitive and easy-to-use dedicated interface is designed: it supports distinguishing between ""pre-meal"" and ""post-meal"" records to help you clearly sort out the correlation between diet and blood glucose changes.
2. Multi-Dimensional Coverage: Meet the Needs of Comprehensive Health Management

In addition to blood pressure and blood glucose, the APP also supports the recording of basic indicators such as heart rate, height and weight, and is also equipped with reference for healthy diet guidelines—from basic physiological data to daily diet suggestions, it covers your health management needs in one stop, eliminating the need to switch between multiple tools.
Disclaimer

VitalTide APP is only used as a tool for recording and organizing health data. It cannot replace medical equipment nor provide medical diagnosis or treatment advice. If you have any health discomfort, need to obtain professional medical opinions or make medical decisions, please be sure to consult a practicing doctor to ensure your health and safety.",2025-09-18T07:00:00Z,2025-09-25T01:56:08Z

kw,Kuwait,Health & Fitness,6013,19,1459266578,صحتي | Sehhaty,Lean Business Services Co,https://apps.apple.com/kw/app/%D8%B5%D8%AD%D8%AA%D9%8A-sehhaty/id1459266578?uo=4,0.0,4.58212,1376,Health & Fitness,"تم تطوير صحتي من قبل وزارة الصحة في المملكة العربية السعودية تماشياً مع رؤيتها لتسهيل الوصول للرعاية الصحية وتحسين جودتها وزيادة الوعي الصحي في المجتمع.
- تعد صحتي منصة وطنية لصحة سكان المملكة من مواطنين ومقيمين من خلال توفير المعلومات الصحية والخدمات ذات الصلة لأكثر من 24 مليون مستفيد.
- تهدف منصة صحتي إلى تمكين الأفراد من الحصول على معلوماتهم الصحية وتلقي الخدمات الطبية الإلكترونية التي تقدمها المؤسسات الصحية المختلفة في المملكة.

ضمن استراتيجية الوزارة لتسهيل الوصول للرعاية الصحية وتحسين جودتها جرى العمل على دمج جميع التطبيقات في القطاع الصحي. وتم حتى الان دمج كلا من موعد وتطمن وصحة ورصد وبطاقة التأمين من مجلس الضمان. والعمل مستمر لإكمال الربط مع باقي الخدمات في المنظومة الصحية.
- بعض هذه الخدمات تشمل:
مواعيد فحص كوفيد 19: بأكثر من 24 مليون موعد
لقاح كوفيد 19: تم تقديم أكثر من 51 مليون جرعة لقاح
المواعيد: تم حجز أكثر من 3.8 مليون موعد ما بين حضوري وافتراضي
التقارير الطبية (مثل الإجازات المرضية): تم إصدار أكثر من 9.5 مليون تقرير إجازة مرضي
استشارة فورية: تقديم أكثر من 1.5 مليون استشارة
تعزيز نمط الحياة الصحي والوعي: تسجيل أكثر من 2 مليون فرد في حملة المشي وأكثر من 700 ألف في مبادرة اعرف أرقامك لتسجيل المؤشرات الحيوية.
بالإضافة إلى تقديم خدمات أخرى:
المحفظة الصحية
وصفات الأدوية
خدمة طبيبي
لقاحات الأطفال
البحث عن الأدوية (رصد)
Sehhaty is provided by the Ministry of Health in Saudi Arabia, in line with its vision to increase access to care, improve standards of healthcare and increase health awareness in the community.
It is the National Population Health Platform for all citizens’ and residents’ health information and related services in Saudi Arabia with over 24 million user registered.
It aims to enable individuals to obtain their health information and receive medical e-services provided by different health organizations in the Kingdom.

Within the Ministry's strategy to facilitate access to health care and improve, its quality, great achievements have been accomplished   to integrate all applications in the health sector. So far; Mawid, Tetamman, Sehha app., RSD and insurance card from the Council of Health Insurance have been merged. Work is ongoing to complete to merge with the rest of the services in the health systems.
Some of these services include:
COVID-19 Tests appointments: With +24 Million appointment
COVID-19 Vaccine: +51 Million vaccine dosage administered
Appointments: +3.8 Million physician and virtual appointments booked
Medical Reporting (e.g. Sick leave): +9.5 million Sick leave report issued
Real-time consultation: +1.5 million consultation
Promoting healthy lifestyle and awareness: +2 Million Registered individuals in the walking campaign and +700K in Know Your Numbers Initiative for capturing health related vital signs.
In addition to other services:
Health Wallet
Medication Prescriptions
My Doctor Service
Children Vaccine
Drug Search (RSD)
Sehhaty app needs access to your HealthApp via  HealthKit and CareKit to share your walking activities and the number of steps",2019-08-18T21:44:56Z,2025-10-28T12:56:13Z

kw,Kuwait,Health & Fitness,6013,23,896501514,Period & Cycle Tracker,ABISHKKING LIMITED.,https://apps.apple.com/kw/app/period-cycle-tracker/id896501514?uo=4,0.0,4.92885,3120,Health & Fitness,"** Top Rating Reproductive Health App **
Check out the most widely-used period, ovulation & pregnancy tracker, which has been helping to improve the well-being of over 300,000,000 women across 45+ countries in the past decade.
We understand your concerns about your private data security, especially with the recent news.
Here's how we protect your data:
• You can use our app without creating an account.
• You remain COMPLETELY ANONYMOUS while using our app.
• You can DELETE ALL DATA in 1 click whenever you want.
At every stage of your life, we safeguard your well-being.
PERIOD & CYCLE CALENDAR

We'll remind you of the dates when your next period starts and ends on time. It's useful whether you have irregular or regular menses. Better? You'll receive tailored PMS advice and instant menstrual pain relief guidance.
OVULATION & FERTILITY TRACKER
We help you calculate your most fertile days and analyze your fertility window based on your unique cycle. You can get pregnant naturally ASAP by learning your CHANCE OF CONCEPTION every day.
PREGNANCY MODE: WEEK-BY-WEEK
Follow your baby's weekly growth. Use our due date calculator to find out when your baby's BIG DAY will be and count down it.
BIRTH CONTROL PLANNER
Quickly record and stay on track with your contraceptive methods like pills, rings, patches, injections, IUDs, or implants. You can customize the reminder message for individual services.
PILL REMINDER
Set start date, interval, durations, and dose quantity for any medication, drugs, or supplements. So you won't forget to take pills when life gets busy.
SYMPTOM PREDICTIONS & TIPS
Record your symptoms during any life stage. Get predictions and courses to learn how to deal with them. Take breast self-exam monthly to find abnormalities early.
>>Key Features:
- Accurate prediction & reminders of menstruation & the most fertile days
- Track the cycle lengths, flow intensity, when you are ovulating, birth control methods, etc.
- Log 58 symptoms, 67 moods, and energy levels to know your menstrual pattern
- Track daily chance of getting pregnant with BBT, cervical mucus, ovulation & pregnancy test records
- Baby's due date countdown
- Baby's weekly growth tracker
- Export a health report with charts for self-archive or doctors
- Insights from fertility specialists
- PIN code, Face ID, & Fingerprint lock to protect your private data
- Daily health tracker: weight, hydration, sleep, mood, sex, steps, etc.
- Breast self-exam guidance
- Multiple accounts to track for different, for example, mother/daughter
- Unlimited app themes & pets
- Available in 39 languages
- Sync data with Apple Health
- Backup and restore data between devices
Note: Period Calendar should not be used to replace any form of contraceptive method.
Subscription Terms and Details
- Get unlimited access to all features for USD $49.99/year:
- The payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.
- The subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
- Subscription may be managed, and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to Account Settings after purchase.
- The account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period.
- Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication.
